keyFacts: The document is a set of prison log sheets detailing 30-minute observational checks on inmates in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at MCC New York.
The checks were conducted on July 9, 2019, across multiple tiers (Z, ZA, ZB, etc.) of the SHU.
The protocol required staff to observe each inmate in locked-down status at least twice per hour, on an irregular schedule with checks no more than 40 minutes apart.
Each sheet was reviewed and signed off by a Morning Watch Lieutenant and a Captain, indicating a chain of accountability for inmate monitoring.
